Bash(git merge 002-ai-chatbot -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge Phase III: AI Chatbot with Security Enhancements

This merge brings the complete AI chatbot feature with comprehensive 
security enhancements and bug fixes from the 002-ai-chatbot branch.

Major Features:
- AI Chatbot \(Phase III\) with Gemini AI integration
- Tags/Labels system for task organization
- Bulk operations for task management
- Security hardening \(CSRF, input sanitization, API key protection\)
- Better error messages for quota limits and auth failures
- TypeScript fixes for production build
- Comprehensive test infrastructure

Statistics:
- 29 commits merged
- 50+ files changed
- 5 critical security issues fixed
- 4 major features added

All changes tested and documented.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
